TextView.android:text:
Device that helps support adjusting sitting posture. This device continuously monitors your posture and provides real-time feedback to help you maintain a correct sitting position. It alerts you when you are sitting incorrectly, ensuring that you develop good sitting habits and reduce the risk of posture-related health issues.

Instructions for using the device:
1. Place the device in front of you at a distance of 1m.
2. Adjust the height so it is at eye level.
3. Log in to the app and start monitoring.
4. Sit down and begin your work. The device will automatically monitor your posture.
5. If you receive an alert, adjust your posture as instructed.
